website_summaries.verdict: Customers love this oil for its high quality and effectiveness.
pros: Buyers claim it works well for a variety of ailments
cons: Some felt that it had no effect whatsoever, while others report side effects such as severe itching and nausea

customer_reviews.title: When can you get this price down again like it was in the past
customer_reviews.text: It breaks my heart that the price for your premium blackseed oil with 5x TH... has doubled. That makes it impossible for retirees living on a single retirement pay check to be able to afford. When can you get this price down again like it was in the past? At $60 per 32 oz. bottle, it was affordable. Please do something about this. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mary moss

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware buy the small amount so you dont end up getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: The potency of this oil has dropped tremendosly. I bought an 8 oz the first time at a super supplement store and was hooked ever since. I thought, hey its on amazon and lets buy the 32oz so i dont run out as quick. As i opened it up excited to take my first dose, I noticed right away that it was no where near the same potency and also noticed it being watered down. Im very disappointed that i spent near $100 dollars only to be let down. Shame on Amazing herbs and Amazon for allowing this scam. I will get my future orders else where.
customer_reviews.author: Fnu

customer_reviews.title: Love the product.  Not a fan of the plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the 32 oz bottle of Amazing herbs Black Seed Oil. The product is high quality and works just fine. I would recommend, however (or in addition), to purchase some glass bottles to transfer the oil in. Why? The oil seeps through the plastic bottle. I can literally wipe clean the bottle, set it on the counter, and the next morning, there is a light film of oil all over the bottle It seeps through the plastic pores. So if you are going to get this bottle, make sure you have several glass jars on hand to transfer the contents. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cheeseborough

customer_reviews.title: This product has literally changed my life. i suffer ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has literally changed my life. i suffer form a chronic condition and this oil has gave me my life back. it has gave me energy, alertness, mental focus, it was stabilized my mood, (no more depression), ......i can go on and on. i am sitting here crying typing this because this product has gave me my life back after being diagnosed with my condition...EVERYBODY should get this oil. We live in a polluted world full of toxins and this oil will put your body in a clean state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - But wow, the price change!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I was skeptical at first about the many claims for Black Seed Oil, but now I'm totally sold on it. It seems to give me a energy boost and good mood when I take it during the day, and at night it helps me get a good night's sleep. Maybe it's just a placebo effect...who knows? I'd planned to keep taking this, but my goodness, the price has skyrocketed by 25% since I last purchased this product in November '16. I guess the word is spreading.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Dexterhaven

customer_reviews.title: Let Black Seed Oil, Spring Up Health In You.
customer_reviews.text: I have read about all the wonderful things Black Seed oil does for the body, so I bought a 32oz bottle from Amazon.com. I've been using it now for about a month, and I've noticed a couple of things it has helped me to get rid of. I had trigger fingure on both hands, now their gone. I was having trouble with my blood pressure, now it's coming under controll. Do I contribute this to The Black Seed Oil, well God made it, and He said Every Thing He made was good and very good, that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Tastes too light
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as strong as the little bottle ones. Won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: DC16

customer_reviews.title: Has this product been diluted?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of black seed oil that I got from this company. However, the taste and color are not the same. The color of this bottle (2nd one) is lighter and it doesn't taste as strong as the first bottle. Has it been diluted with some other oil? I don't know if I will buy this product for this brand again. I will look for a more consistent product unless I'm offered to replace this bottle with another one like the first one I bought. I'm using this to fight cancer and I can not take risks if products are not 100% pure.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Definitely felt a difference !!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say I have any particular ailment I was trying to treat with black seed oil but I wanted to my daily vitamin regiment. I can say I feel a sense of well being and calmness when I take it . I recommend getting a small narrow top bottle like In my photo to poor you daily dose because the big black bottle gets super oily on the sides every time I tried to poor from it. But the packaging is good as this amount of oil will last you a long time so you need a good lid like this. I keep mine in the fridge after opening
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: I want what I paid for !
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied at all .. I normally buy this product from the actual Amazing herbs website, this time I didn’t and the content inside is NOT blackseed oil ! It seems like it’s mixed has no flavor at all . Black seed oil has a bitter strong taste, this what I just got however does not !! I’m very upset that I spent 60 bucks on what taste like just regular cod liver oil
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: pricing is rediculous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil, and did not see any difference so far. The price has gone up in less than two months from $63.00 to $67.00. Come on this is taking advantage of people. I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: patty dindial

customer_reviews.title: Why such an increase in price???
customer_reviews.text: I have just started this and finished my first bottle without much difference in the many auto immune symptoms I have. Thought I would try one more bottle and I went to purchase another one and it had jumped up in price by $22... Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I did even after reading the previous review's...wrong decision... i been using the 16oz bottle for over a yr.. i decided to get this bigger container. Almost immediately after my first dose i can tell its diluted.. its not the plastic container its obviously diluted...
customer_reviews.author: Ke

customer_reviews.title: An experience.
customer_reviews.text: The lid is easy to open, the bottle is a plain no non-sense bottle (which is nice!) A spout/stopper of some variety would have made it easier to pour. Start with a smaller dose (and always with food!) Too much of this at once on an empty stomach will .. *ahem* shoot right through you.
customer_reviews.author: cr2032

customer_reviews.title: Potency has declined drastically!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but after being scammed i must, I've been using this brand of black seed oil for quite sometime now (32 oz bottle ) just purchased a new bottle and immediately everyone in the family could recognize that they're now cutting this product with some other oil, it's potency has dramatically declined, needless to say we will NOT be purchasing it again!

Will Give You More Results When My Diabetes Meds Are Gone....

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: After 60 days of taken it my back ache disappeared , wake up and no pain,take it regularly for 2 yrs now

customer_reviews.title: High Priced!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for years, but recently based on research I can no longer justify the high end price. Cold pressed is cold pressed, right? There are very similar products out there at a full $20 less for a 32oz. container. Gotta move on now.

customer_reviews.text: I just take a teaspoon twice a day. And it has helped with my asthma and high blood pressure

Going to give some to my son as he has stage four bone cancer and see if it helps him. Thanks for carrying this great product! I will be purchasing more soon.

customer_reviews.title: Reduces your blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works better for me than the prescription Staten drugs.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly diluted? more watery than oily.
customer_reviews.text: We have bought different brand black seed oil before.This one in comparison to the other one we bought was much more diluted. The taste isn't as strong and much lighter in color.It's more watery consistency verse oily.With all these factors in mind, makes me wonder on the benefits of it if it's watered down :(

customer_reviews.title: Great energy, great clarity and an overall sense of ...
customer_reviews.text: I will never be without this Black Seed oil. It seemed a little stronger than the last bottle I received but it works. Great energy, great clarity and an overall sense of wellness. Oh and by the way, it has been great for my skin.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't taste great, especially toward the end of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does help with everything. I have systemic inflammation - so arthritis, headaches, eczema, asthma etc. I'm trying to avoid pharmaceuticals for as long as possible. And I'm less hungry too. Everything has improved. It doesn't taste great, especially toward the end of the bottle, so be sure to shake it before taking. But you get used to the taste (sort of).
customer_reviews.author: AlliJeanBeans

customer_reviews.title: the seal was lifted.
customer_reviews.text: The seal was broken just like soooo many prepend have written in their reveiw. I had never used black seed oil before so I didn't have anything to compare it to. I ordered a 16oz black seed oil from Isreal on ebay and IT IS the same. I sure hope that it is Not cut with another oil. I've been taking a teaspoon in the morning and at night... don't feel any different, but I did put it on My body where it hurt. It really works Y'all! Plantar fiscitis pain gone and back ache gone! Massage it in really good.

customer_reviews.title: Again don’t like that it is in a plastic bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck 🤢

If I would of known about the taste and smell, I would of bought the pill form. So I did some research and there is quite a few things you can mix the oil with to mask the taste slightly... honey or cold water. Whatever you use though... the smell and taste will linger. Will not be buying this again.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I'm officially addicted to this black seed oil. The taste is phenomenal and a little goes a LONG way for flavor. This oil mixed with herbs along with another oil such as olive or safflower oil and raw cider vinegar makes some of the best vinaigrette I've ever made. For some reason, the bigger bottle I purchased tasted far better [?]! The first tiny bottle I bought tasted way more astringent.

customer_reviews.title: BPA free or not?
customer_reviews.text: excellent oil, the taste does not bother me if I know it is helping. I paid $36 for a 32 Oz. The price has increased 100%. I have to now bought another bottle. re price but but knowing what we now know, I have a major concern: This is a plastic bottle but no where does it say that it is this BPA free. I would like a response from the seller regarding this, prior to opening this bottle..

In the morning I mix one tea spoon of black seed oil and one tea spoon of raw/organic honey with half glass of warm water and drink it. It gives me energy for all my day. Plus this is very good for athletes as it has essential amino acids for muscle growth

customer_reviews.title: Definitely watered-down and not the same product I bought in the store

I'm very disappointed that I paid this much and it's not the same potency. Same flavor, but much more mild and not as thick. Save your money and buy it in-store so you can return it if it's not up to original standards.

customer_reviews.title: This is a rewarding supplement to my daily diet
customer_reviews.text: This is a rewarding supplement to my daily diet, I take this first thing each morning with a splash of juice in order to quench the terrible taste. I take this daily for the reported health benefits, it helps with blood pressure, cholesterol, diabetes, digestive system, and overall general health. The taste is horrible, but it does not last at all, no after taste to deal with all day. I have added this to my diet for the past 6 years daily.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance bought this same brand in the store for a lot more. Much more affordable to get it through Amazon and that's not always the case. I notice my grown-up acne is better when I use this. I don't bother mixing it like other people. I just take two tablespoons and wash it down with something more pleasant tasting. The second tablespoon always seems spicier. Would purchase again, especially at this price.

I've been its biggest promoter. Many friends and family members are using it now.

customer_reviews.title: I started using this for the many health benefits that ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this for the many health benefits that I have been reading. Hours after taking the first dosage, I noticed that my sinus's were clearing up. I've also been applying it to my hair line and have given myself a hot oil treatment with it. Thus far all results are positive. I drink a teaspoon daily in hot water. I'm not clear on whether the suggestion of raw honey aids in it's effectiveness or is used to cut the flavor. Sometimes I add it to the water but not recently.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was my imagination. I have used this brand of black seed oil for years. I normally buy it from our vitamin store. But, it is the same cost for half. While the taste of the amazon purchase is about the same, it doesn’t burn my throat slightly like the store brand. I wake up with stomach acid. And, I don’t wake up feeling refreshed. I thought my body had gotten used to it. Went and purchased the oil at the store. Taste like it should, works like it should. I do believe one of two things. My batch was bad from Amazon or the product was diluted on purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Once you get past the taste, all's well

I'm so excited knowing it's working even though I've not yet seen the results. I believe in this product and i'm so grateful to be patience for the outcome. Thank you so much.....tom kelly

Not an awesome smell to be noticed by I will say. Other than that, it's pretty pure and smooth and I like it. Would give it 5 stars, but that taste and smell yeesh.

I take it by adding a teaspoon of it to a cup of hot water with a teaspoon of honey and a couple shakes of powdered cinnamon. I'm taking it in hopes of gaining relief from inflammation. I will need to take it longer before I know if it is effective. When I take it regularly, I feel good. Can't really put my finger on anything in particular, just a general sense of well being.

Down a 1 oz shot class of this product in the morning and you will never need to worry about whether of not you have enough HEALTHY fats in your diet. I have found that also curbs my appetite quite well.

customer_reviews.title: I'm still amazed by this miracle cure

Was almost ready to give up and thought I had to live with the misery of symptoms the rest of my life. Tried this and after two weeks now of not being on meds and taking a teaspoon of this a day, I am cured of symptoms! I take a teaspoon every morning in warm water, a little honey and a few dashes of cinnamon. Not to mention it's also suppressed my appetite, so I'm sure it'll help weight loss too. Recommending this to all my family and friends, I'm still amazed by this miracle cure!!

customer_reviews.title: kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed due to the fact that I've had Klonji oil before and it was a little darker in color and the taste was stronger so I'm unsure on what's wrong with this brand and it is watered down so has anyone else experience this? I only gave 3 stars due to it coming on time but I'm really disappointed in the quality of this product
customer_reviews.author: Lifereborn

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Rash Remedy
customer_reviews.text: Best remedy for diaper rash. It's clean to put on, light, and all natural. No need for any other ointments or cream. Just wash your baby's bum in water, pat dry, and rub a small amount of black seed oil on the rash and put a new diaper on. Its worked for me with every child I've had and I've never had to buy anything else for diaper rash. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Red Sonya

customer_reviews.title: great product and value
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is something that definetely takes some time to get used to, but worth it for the health benefits. If you mix it with a juice or something it is not as bad.. This size bottle for the price was an excellent deal.

customer_reviews.title: "Chemical" Taste
customer_reviews.text: Product had a chemical taste to it. Seal was broken upon receipt. Did not feel safe using internally; used only on feet and hands.

customer_reviews.title: I am a little amazed
customer_reviews.text: Well so far I have no complaints I infuse what I bought with saffron it does seem to leak through the plastic Will have to wait a month or two to see what effects it has on my body one thing happen that I don’t know it may be related I take painkillers 168 5 mg a month or every 20 Eight days I went in because I had to give a urine test nothing showed up in my body like all the impurities was washed awayWeird

customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. The taste takes getting used to but the results are well worth the momentary torture. Its a cure all. LOOK UP THE BENEFITS of this thing. My energy and overall wellness is at its best EVER!

customer_reviews.text: Heard so much about this. Finally tried it and it's changing my body in a great way. Can't wait for everything to level out. And I will take this for as long as it's available to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Black Seed Cold-Pressed Oil
customer_reviews.text: We love this oil, it seems to help with hair growth, my daughter who hates everything, actually asks for this oil, it helps her to sleep better and since using it, I've lost a few pounds, now I'm not saying that these things will happen for others, however it's working for us. Love it.

customer_reviews.text: This product has help with my digestive problems as well as my skin disorder. This is a must have for your daily regiment.

customer_reviews.title: Black Cumin Seed Oil
customer_reviews.text: Started taking this oil today. Already I can feel a big difference with my tinnitus. The ringing isn't as noticeable and that's what I noticed right away, about an hour or two later...it definitely is an acquired taste! To me it tastes like turpentine. The after taste doesn't linger too long. If it works wonders for me, it's a small price to pay.

customer_reviews.title: Black Seed Oil
customer_reviews.text: The product is outstanding and it works. The problem was the 32 oz bottle it leaked from the cap and we could not get it to stop because the cap would not snug tight. The 32oz had a good price. If we order more we will order the smaller sizes

product_meta.title: Amazing Herbs Black Seed Cold-Pressed Oil - 32oz
product_meta.description:
Size:32 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)100% Pure, Black Seed Oil (Also known as Black Cumin Oil) - Cold Pressed & Solvent Free - 32oz Black HDPE Bottle. 

Amazing Herbs Premium Black Seed oil is a valuable source of EFA's 3/6/9's and also contains two very powerful phytochemicals Nigellone and Thymoquinone along with other nutrients that work synergistically to support the body's various functions. 

Directions: 

Suggested Use: For adults, take 1/2 to 1 teaspoon per day, with meals, or as directed by a physician. 
Storage: May be kept refrigerated or stored at room temperature, keep away from heat or direct sunlight.
feature_bullets: Freshly cold-pressed (first-pressing) using only the highest quality NON-GMO and organically sourced Nigella Sativa seeds
Has a spicy and pungent flavor and is pressed from Indian or Turkish seeds
